title: ponnAna tirumukhattai
sahitya:
ponnAna tirumukhattai bhuvi engum pArttunadu bOdhamAi nirkkavaruLAi iraivA


anupallavi

  un AnaiyAl eNNi un Anai mozhi pEshi un Anai vazhi ninrE mannA en vAzhvuyyap-


caraNam    kaNNuLLE pArppavanum karuttuLLE ninaippavanum karaNattil aribavanum nI
paNNuLLE Osai nI viNNuLLE shakti nI parishuddhamE parAparamE cidambaramE
